amendment.description: To strengthen the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2215 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2215 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator King to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4188) To strengthen the Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency.
